channel.title: 508 Change the XP Per Hit
channel.description: Hello, How do I changethe XP per hit when i hit a NPC a 1 is 120 xp id lik to change that to 1000 xp? any ideas? - thanks nardoscape

@nardoscape wrote:

didnt work stil hits 120 xp rate. even tho i replaced and stuff ill try to figure out on my own but thanks anyways

item.title: 508 Change the XP Per Hit
item.dc:creator: @Masta_69 Masta 69
item.description:
@Masta_69 wrote:

Open playercombat.java or something like that. Search for int CombatXPRate = . Change the number after it to 1. Now search if(p.attackStyle == 0) { and you will see where you can edit xp rates. Replace whatâ€™s there with

if(p.attackStyle == 0) { //Accurate p.addSkillXP(1000 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,0); } if(p.attackStyle == 1) { //Strong p.addSkillXP(1000 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,2); } if(p.attackStyle == 2) { //Block p.addSkillXP(1000 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,1); } if(p.attackStyle == 3) { //All around p.addSkillXP((300 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,0); p.addSkillXP((300 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,1); p.addSkillXP((300 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,2); }

Read full topic
